socketedItems.secDescrText: A wave of divine fire deals damage in a line, then creates Consecrated Ground and deals damage in an area around the targeted location. A larger shockwave then expands outwards, damaging enemies standing on Consecrated Ground that were not already hit.

Base duration is 4.00 seconds
50% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
Consecrated Ground applies 5% increased Damage taken to Enemies
Shockwave deals 25% less Damage

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies. If enemies are left below 10% of maximum life after being hit by these skills, they will be killed.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
